metadata.title: Crash During Experimental Test Flight Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation GVI (G650), N652GD Roswell, New Mexico April 2, 2011
metadata.author(s): National Transportation Safety Board, Deborah A.P. Hersman, Robert L. Sumwalt, Mark R. Rosekind, Earl F. Weener,
